game.name: Beach Restaurant
game.description:
This is a wonderful location of a beautiful beach where you maintain a full-fledged restaurant. Since your restaurant is very old and popular, so people love to visit it to fulfil their varied food needs near the beach. Are you ready to accept this cooking challenge? Join Beach Restaurant and get ready to cook and serve people with the food dishes they want! In this one of the highly addictive cooking games for girls, you have to control a romantic restaurant that is located near the beach. We are sure that you will have fun in the unlimited proportion.?
When you explore this one of the highly challenging girls games, you will see that customers are coming to your restaurant regularly. Your job is to prepare and serve their desired food in the least possible time. In case if you fail in delivering their food timely, you might have to face their impatient behaviour. So, make sure to serve them as quickly as you can to get some extra money, which you can use for your various important tasks, like the upgradation of your restaurant.
You are playing the role of a new restaurant manager in this cool HTML5 game for kids. So, make sure to avoid any mistakes that could spoil the name of your establishment. In the virtual kitchen of this restaurant game for girls, you will have a full control on all the things to allow your customers leave with a big smile. This brand new free online cooking game can be played in four modes: Buy Coin, Shop, Free Play and Career.?
